text: The Division of McPherson is an Australian Electoral Division in Queensland. It was set up in 1948 and is named after the McPherson Range. McPherson is in south east Queensland, and is based on the southern portion of the Gold Coast City. ==Members== Member Party Term (Sir) Arthur Fadden Country 1949–1958 Charles Barnes Country 1958–1972 Eric Robinson Liberal 1972–1981 Peter White Liberal 1981–1990 John Bradford Liberal 1990–1998 Christian Democrats 1998–1998 Margaret May Liberal 1998–2010 Karen Andrews Liberal National 2010–present ==Election results== ==References== ==Other websites== * Division of McPherson (Qld) -- Australian Electoral Commission * Karen Andrews website Category:Electoral divisions of Queensland Category:1949 establishments in Australia
title: Division of McPherson
